channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 01:49 Dumping anxiety in Kyiv. Stop by further messages.
item.description: 游릭 01:49 Dumping anxiety in Kyiv. Stop by further messages.#M_Kyev This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 01:39 Driven anxiety in the Nikolaev area. Stop after further messages.
item.description: 游릭 01:39 Driven anxiety in the Nikolaev area. Stop after further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 00:56 Flashing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community-mirorskaya territorial community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 00:56 Flashing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community-mirorskaya territorial community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk.
